.. installation:

===============
Getting Started
===============

Preferred::

 sudo pip install PySquashfsImage

Alternatively::

 sudo easy_install PySquashfsImage 

.. toctree::
   :maxdepth: 2

Application structure
+++++++++++++++++++++

This is a single module library in pure Python with no dependencies.
